product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Fleece Sleeping Bag - Special Buy
long_description: Great for hostels, camping in warm weather, or using as an additional layer of insulation with your existing bag, this soft polyester-fleece bag offers smooth comfort wherever you lay your head.
